text.front:
Thermodynamic properties of an anharmonic fermionic oscillator
S. M. de Souza, S. Moss de Oliveira, and M. T. Thomaz
Citation: American Journal of Physics 60, 1122 (1992); doi: 10.1119/1.16958
View online: http://dx.doi.org/10.1119/1.16958
View Table of Contents: http://scitation.aip.org/content/aapt/journal/ajp/60/12?ver=pdfcov
Published by the American Association of Physics Teachers
